entry.title: Risk-averse optimal control
entry.summary:
Our paper titled "Risk-averse risk-constrained optimal control," (authors: P. Sopasakis, M. Schuurmans, P. Patrinos) has been accepted for publication in European Control Conference 2019.

This work is accompanied by the MATLAB toolbox marie...

entry.title: SuperSCS: OpEn's sister project
entry.summary:
SuperSCS is a sister project of OpEn.

SuperSCS is a fast solver for large-scale conic problems. It is written in C and can be interfaced from a lot of different programming languages.

The paper titled "SuperSCS: fast and accurate large-scale con...

entry.summary: Our paper titled "Aerial navigation in obstructed environments with embedded nonlinear model predictive control" (authors: E. Small, P. Sopasakis, E. Fresk, P. Patrinos and G. Nikolakopoulos) has been accepted for publication in European Co...

entry.title: First Release of OpEn
entry.summary: This is the first release of Optimization Engine (OpEn) and we're very excited about it!
